limitations.title: RAG isn‚Äôt magic

threshold.label: Similarity Threshold
threshold.description: Controls how strict the RAG system is. Higher values provide more precise but potentially fewer answers, lower values provide more but potentially less relevant answers.
threshold.rec_lenient: Suitable for exploratory queries, may include more irrelevant content
threshold.rec_balanced: Recommended setting, balances precision and recall
threshold.rec_strict: Only answers highly relevant questions, may often return cannot answer

system.title: System Rules
system.strictRagOn: ON: AI will refuse to answer when data is insufficient
system.strictRagOff: OFF: AI may supplement with general knowledge
system.inferenceOn: ON: May make reasonable inferences within document scope
system.inferenceOff: OFF: Only answers explicitly stated in documents
system.noDataPolicyDesc: When no relevant data is found, AI will clearly inform the user and suggest possible alternative questions.

style.kidFriendly: Use simple metaphors so kids understand

persona.educator: Simple, gradual explanations with life examples
persona.neighbor: Chatty and relatable, uses everyday metaphors

workflow.crawlerSuccess: Website {{url}} crawled successfully, {{pages}} pages in total

ragConfig.title: Retrieval Strategy Configuration
ragConfig.description: Fine-tune similarity and Top-K for more precise and comprehensive queries, with adjustable chunk size and safety thresholds.
ragConfig.detailMessage:
Retrieval strategy configures how AI finds the most relevant data from Vector DB before answering questions.

By adjusting similarity threshold and retrieval count, you can control:

Whether AI uses 'only highly relevant data'

Or expands search scope when necessary to avoid missing important information

This step only affects data Retrieval, not AI's response style or language generation.

promptConfig.title: System Prompt
promptConfig.description: Define model behavior, answer scope, capabilities and safety rules
promptConfig.detailMessage: System Prompt is different from regular user prompts in chat. Regular prompts let the model 'use its own memory/understanding to answer as best as possible'. In RAG, system prompts are usually set to force guide the LLM to answer based on context documents, which can significantly reduce hallucinations and improve factual accuracy and credibility.

dataUpload.title: Data Upload
dataUpload.description: Upload files or crawl website data.
dataUpload.detailMessage: This step allows you to upload text files or use website crawler to extract web content. The system will receive and parse text content, which will become the core knowledge base of the AI assistant, and the AI will only communicate based on this content.

contentReview.title: Content Review
contentReview.detailMessage: This step detects whether uploaded content contains dangerous information, sensitive content, or hate speech. Ensure your knowledge base meets safety standards and protects user privacy and corporate information security.

textProcessing.title: Data Processing & Vector DB Storage
textProcessing.description: Chunk files, convert to vectors, and store in Vector DB for subsequent retrieval
textProcessing.detailMessage:
Simply put, this step converts text into a series of numbers as passwords, allowing computers to compare and find more relevant content.
And 'Vector DB (Vector Database)' is a special database that specifically stores these vector passwords and can help you find content that is 'most relevant' to your question.

Traditional databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB are good at 'precise exact matching'; but Vector DB specializes in 'vector comparison, visual comparison' because human questions and answers are often not exactly the same keywords, but express 'similar meanings', so this similarity-finding superpower is needed.

aiChat.title: AI Chat
aiChat.detailMessage: Start answering questions based on the vector database. AI will retrieve relevant content based on questions and provide accurate answers, and will provide original sources to ensure answer credibility and traceability.

similarityThreshold.title: Similarity Threshold
similarityThreshold.description: Controls the confidence threshold for citations, higher values are stricter

topK.title: Top-K Retrieval Count
topK.description: Controls the number of chunks retrieved per query, balances information quantity and precision

items.harm: Detect harmful content (blocks harassment, hate speech, sexual content, dangerous content)

contentReview.harmfulDetected: Harmful content detected: harassment, hate speech, sexual content, or dangerous content
contentReview.serviceUnavailable: Content review service is temporarily unavailable, this check was skipped
contentReview.uploadFirst: Please upload files in the "Data Upload" step first
contentReview.infoHint: Checks file safety and content compliance
contentReview.successSubtext: Content meets policy; you may continue to the next step
contentReview.failureSubtext: Inappropriate content detected. Click "Previous" to re-upload.
